definitions.definition: A flower , especially one indicating that a fruit tree is fruiting ; ( collectively ) a mass of such flowers.
examples: The blossom has come early this year.

definitions.definition: The state or season of producing such flowers.
A blooming period or stage of development ; something lovely that gives rich promise .
The colour of a horse that has white hairs intermixed with sorrel and bay hairs.

main_definition: A flower , especially one indicating that a fruit tree is fruiting ; ( collectively ) a mass of such flowers.
secondary_definitions: The state or season of producing such flowers.
( figurative ) A blooming period or stage of development ; something lovely that gives rich promise .
The colour of a horse that has white hairs intermixed with sorrel and bay hairs.
